name: CbcPartialNodeInfo
brief: Incremental subproblem storage as differences from parent

algorithms.name:
Delta-Encoded Node State for Memory Efficiency
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcPartialNodeInfo stores subproblem state as changes from parent:
- CoinWarmStartDiff for basis changes
- Only modified variable bounds
- New cuts added at this node

Memory-efficient: Stores only differences, reconstructs via parent chain.
applyToModel() walks ancestor chain to rebuild complete state.

see:
CoinWarmStartDiff for basis difference representation

Edwin 11/24/09 carved from CbcNode
